name: HoiAn by MeVui
address: Jl. Padang Linjong, Canggu, Kec. Kuta Utara, Kabupaten Badung, Bali 80351, Indonesia
review 1:
Nice place to hang out.
All dine in area is non air con, but its windy and have lots of shades from trees.
Serving time is quite long, even thou it is not full.
Have a lot of menu variants, all tastes good.
Will come back another time.
review 2: I only met him a few days ago, I had heard about him. good free parking. calm, relaxing environment, good food, friendly staff. the typical Viet food has been slightly adapted to international demand: tasty, good portions with medium-low prices. the quality/price ratio is convenient. the prices displayed are real, without added taxes, OK
review 3: I had a delightful dining experience ordering the medium pho ga, banh mi, spring rolls, and grilled chicken. Everything was incredibly delicious, and I'll definitely be back. The service was also very friendly.
review 4: Breakfast/lunch with a wonderful view of Canggu Rice Paddy. I tried the Pho Sai Gon, the broth is clear, fresh, and flavourful. The iced coffee is also recommended (however i advise you to order it less-sweet), the spring rolls were okay, the pork and prawns were fresh.
review 5:
Try to come here before lunchtime if you don‚Äôt want to wait too long for your food because this place is always crowded with local and foreign tourists.
Came here so many times when we stayed around the Canggu area. Foods are so tasty and authentic! Made with fresh and locally sourced ingredients, I love their Bun Cha and Spring Rolls, we also ordered Special Pho and Bahn Mi. I love how delicious and affordable the meals are! This is one of our favorite restaurants in Bali, a place where we create memories and enjoy delicious food. It brings lots of happiness to our hearts, The service was really quick and our servers were friendly and polite. well done HoiAn MeVui, we will be back soon.
Love,
üê∞‚ô•Ô∏è‚òïÔ∏è

name: Babi Guling Men Lari
address: Jl. By Pass Tanah Lot, Munggu, Kec. Kuta Utara, Kabupaten Badung, Bali 80237, Indonesia
review 1:
Good Babi Guling, everything was nice but it was quite mild for me.
If you're a Babi Guling first timer, and you're unfamiliar with spices, this place is a great place to start.
Service is excellent, very friendly staff.
review 2: Sooooo good. We ordered the complete set and loved the texture and flavour of the food. It comes with a set. We asked for more belacan (chilli) which gives the food the heat. üíØ
review 3:
Just. Standart. Taste
The grill pork is. Tough meat
All the. Stuff is just. Average
The. Soup. Just oke
Quite. Pricey  65rb
For. 1 plate  but  no specil.
review 4: Spicy but not mind-blowingly yummy, it had a standard kind of taste. It was a meld of crunchy nasi babi, juicy chicken on top of broken rice, served with spiced veggies.
review 5:
A Savor-worthy Delight: Babi Guling Men Lari!

Babi Guling Men Lari is a culinary gem in Bali that promises an extraordinary dining experience. This renowned eatery is a must-visit for anyone seeking to indulge in the tantalizing flavors of the island's famous Babi Guling.

From the moment you enter, the aroma of succulent roasted pork fills the air, whetting your appetite. The star of the show, the Babi Guling, is a masterpiece of crispy skin, tender meat, and fragrant spices. Each bite is a burst of flavors that leaves you craving for more.

The attention to detail and commitment to quality are evident in every aspect of the dining experience. The perfectly cooked pork, accompanied by flavorful side dishes such as lawar salad and sambal matah, create a harmonious symphony of tastes that will leave you in culinary bliss.

The friendly and attentive staff at Babi Guling Men Lari ensure that your visit is nothing short of exceptional. They are always ready to assist and provide recommendations, making you feel like a valued guest.

If you're a food lover seeking an authentic taste of Bali, Babi Guling Men Lari is a must-try. Prepare to embark on a gastronomic adventure that will satisfy your cravings and introduce you to the exquisite flavors of Balinese cuisine. Don't miss the opportunity to savor the legendary Babi Guling and create unforgettable memories in this culinary haven. #BabiGulingMenLari #CulinaryDelight #BaliFoodie

name: Astera Resort Canggu by iNi Vie Hospitality - Luxury Honeymoon Experiences In Canggu
address: Jl. Canggu Padang Linjong No.8x, Canggu, Kec. Kuta Utara, Kabupaten Badung, Bali 80361, Indonesia
review 1:
Brilliant place to stay - loved the villa. Having your own private pool was fantastic. The bed was super-comfortable. Staff were all extremely helpful and welcoming.
The restaurants at the resort both had some great-tasting options, and there are plenty of other amazing places to eat/drink close by.
Would certainly stay again. Greatly enjoyed our time at Astera Resort Canggu - thank you!
review 2:
We had really good time here. Canggu is great location close to cafes, restaurants, and beaches. Astera resort was always very helpful getting us drivers, a scooter, and other things. Great service.

One downside for me was the hotel towels. They felt a bit old and overused and I didn‚Äôt trust their cleanliness.

But otherwise the breakfast, dinners and all else was great.
review 3:
All style, no substance.

My husband and I booked the Luxury Honeymoon Package, but it was anything but luxurious.

Unfortunately, our stay was disappointing. The room was nice and as expected, except for the view. The decoration of flowers in the pool was amazing, but that's about where the good stops.

At check-in, a bond is required, but they only accept credit cards. If you don't have a credit card, you're out of luck.

The food was terrible‚Äîserved lukewarm or cold and not fresh, with stale pastries.

If you're elderly or disabled, avoid this place. The pool in our villa had no stairs for easy access/exit.

The towels were in awful condition‚Äîold, fraying, and full of holes (see photos). Getting fresh towels was a hassle; we had to ask 2-3 times despite allowing reasonable time between requests.

Service is not a priority here. As mentioned, it often took multiple requests to get anything.

The main pool area is poorly maintained. Pool towels were rarely stocked, and empty drink glasses sat for days without being cleared.

The 'rice fields' view is not as depicted on the website, and there's a lot of construction near the main pool.

This place is more concerned with its Instagram appearance. A sign outside reception touting the villas as 'Insta-worthy' says it all.

We will avoid all iNi ViE hospitality in future.
review 4: All the staff are very friendly and greet you nicely. The rooms are amazing and the main pool is definitely worth going in at sunset. It is all very clean and breakfast included was superb. I couldn‚Äôt recommend more of a nicer place.
review 5:
I would like to express my gratitude for the exceptional service provided by the hotel reception staff during our stay in Astera Resort Canggu. When we encountered a problem with our room, the staff was quick to assist and went above and beyond to ensure that we had a memorable and comfortable experience. They not only resolved the issue promptly but also upgraded us to a more luxurious room for the remainder of our vacation.
We highly recommend this hotel to anyone looking for a memorable and delightful stay in BaliüáÆüá©

name: Valle Canggu
address: Jl. Canggu Padang Linjong No.23, Canggu, Kec. Kuta Utara, Kabupaten Badung, Bali 80351, Indonesia
review 1:
We went for breakfast at 10 am and we stayed till 300pm. Very chill place by the pool where you can enjoy your drinks, swim and read your favourite book. The food though not up to my taste but in general I had a fun full dayüòç
The service and the staff were very friendly ‚ú®
review 2: I celebrated my birthday here and my friends and I had a fantastic time! The staff were incredible. The atmosphere was perfect. They prepared some birthday shots and fun party gadgets for me. Speak to Awan to organize an event there. He did a wonderful job!
review 3: This place offers a great ambiance and a pleasant view, making it an excellent choice for those looking for a cafe to work from. The service was excellent, and the clean and well-air conditioned restroom was a thoughtful touch for a hot day in Canggu. Food menu offers generous portions at reasonable prices. This place is kid friendly, making it a great spot to bring family for swim. Its definitely worth spending time here
review 4: I absolutely love this restaurant & pool club! Beautiful interior, friendly staff that goes beyond to satisfy all your requirements! Delicious food, amazing cocktails & great wine too! They have amazing pool with beautiful rice paddy views. I really loved the vibes there. I loved their brunch menu. I really liked their vegan rolls. They have amazing vegan burrito too. They have very big menu selection. Sunbeds, nice bar, and special events with DJ sometimes. You can truly enjoy your day here relaxing at the pool and sipping some great cocktails. We celebrated there my friends birthday & they prepared nice suprise for my friend with birth birthday pancakes, candle & ice cream. The sunset there was absolutely breathtaking! Pictures doesn't even do it justice enough! You need to visit Valle Bali! It's the go spot in Canggu! Miss Europe Tourism Lenka Josefiova.
review 5: Loved it here, came for the evening and had a beautiful sunset! (Amazing photo ops). Good deal on cocktails and the food was really nice. Great atmosphere. Would come back for a day here aswell as evening!

name: Lima Bay
address: Jalan Canggu Padang Linjong No.7, Canggu, Kec. Kuta Utara, Kabupaten Badung, Bali 80351, Indonesia
review 1: If I could give Lima Bay over 5 stars for everything I would! This is definitely the best pool club in the whole of Canggu! If you‚Äôre looking for something smaller than the regular hectic clubs, this is exactly what you need! We visited twice during our time in Canggu and it was the most amazing experience every time! We had the whole place to ourselves in the evening and the staff made us feel like royalty! (Special shout out to Adi and Heny! ‚ù§Ô∏è) This is an absolute MUST when visiting Bali. You won‚Äôt regret it!!
review 2:
Went there for a happy hour drink ! Not too busy that I thought! I hope the drinks can be a bit stronger! But saw people go for a swim in the pool It seems like it is for free that's a plus!
And I booked a table and they know it's for my birthday and they were so sweet gave me a Cake for my birthday üéÇü©µ definitely recommend it
review 3: My favorite day hangout in Canggu. After Lima Bay had their reopening this year I‚Äôve been here at least once a week. Both alone, and brought my friends here to see my fav place. The atmosphere is unique and slow, so it‚Äôs perfect to go for a few hours of chill in the busy life in Canggu. I love how beautiful it is here, and the vibe is lovely with palm trees, pretty colors and a nice pool. I‚Äôm not a fan of pools usually, but they have these pool bean bags that I love. The food is also great (miss the old menu a little bit tho hint hint) and they always present it really pretty. My favorite is the Sunday brunch. Really recommend ü©∑ love u
review 4:
I spent the entire day at Lima bay. Just down the road from my villa - so perfectly located!
Greeted by lovely friendly staff when I arrived and sat on a pre-booked pool lounger (definitely worth pre booking!)
They were doing 2 for 1 cocktails pretty much all day (12 - 4pm) and they were great. I also had some bites - the gnocchi is delicious, so flavoursome and also had the Parmesan and truffle fries which was everything and more.
The vibe was cool - a live DJ played chill house/light EDM/ a tiny bit of funk-pop - not my thing at all but certainly not offensive.

Perfect to laze around all day and have a dip. Loved it. Will be coming back.
review 5:
The aesthetic of the place was visually appealing, creating a delightful atmosphere. Food was quite average

üçµMatcha latte had a pleasant sweetness to it, making it quite enjoyable.
üçµThe crispy corn fritter was doughy and lacked spiciness, was also quite a heavier dish
üçµHash browns stood out as a highlight with its delicious taste

name: Padi Club Bar and Restaurant
address: Jl. Raya Canggu Gang Umah Desa, Canggu, Kec. Kuta Utara, Kabupaten Badung, Bali, Indonesia
review 1:
New restaurant with pool acces in canggu. The vibe there was absolutely incredible! As soon as I walked in, I could feel the energetic and laid-back atmosphere. The food, oh my goodness, it was out of this world! Every bite was bursting with flavor and freshness. And the staff? They were the friendliest and most attentive people I've ever encountered. They made me feel so welcome and took care of every little detail.

But here's the thing, while I was enjoying my meal, I did notice some people from the nearby rice fields trying to clean up. It was a bit distracting, I must admit. But hey, I guess it's all part of the charm of being in such a beautiful natural setting, right?

Oh, and did I mention the promotions they had? It was like a party for my taste buds and my wallet! And the fact that they offer free swimming but towel had to paid.
review 2: Our morning at Padi Club Bar & Restaurant was a blast! The super affordable breakfast package and complimentary swimming made it a great deal. My kids had a fantastic time, thanks to the friendly and helpful staff. A family-friendly spot for a fun-filled morning! ü•∞ü´∂üèº
review 3: Us and our 5yo daughter love the rectangle pool. In the afternoon, the water is slightly warmer, less chlorine & if the weather is nice‚Ä¶an orange sunset can be seen in the background of the rice field vibe. The food is good, and the service is nice. Lovely location!
review 4: beautiful place, clean, comfortable and cheap. must try it. the staff is also friendly. Don't worry, the food is delicious. there is also a  big swimming pool(FREE ENTRY)üòç and bar here. you must visit. the manager is also kind. only here towels are free . I will come backü§çü§çü•Ç‚ú® . The GORGEOUS VIEW ‚ò∫Ô∏èüëçüëè
review 5: The frequent pop-up ads piqued our curiosity, leading us to choose this spot for breakfast. Priced at 40K, inclusive of a drink, the breakfast menu impressed me. Bayu greeted us with a warm smile, ensuring our comfort and checking if we enjoyed our coffee. We also enjoyed a relaxing swim in the serene surroundings, surrounded by lush greenery and refreshing air. This charming place is perfect for a peaceful weekend getaway.

name: Boyana Bali
address: Jl. Pantai Batu Mejan No.1, Canggu, Kec. Kuta Utara, Kabupaten Badung, Bali 80351, Indonesia
review 1:
All food are amaziiingggg
They have no play in taste, everything is very good. Service from staf are super friendly.
The octopus is very smoky and the beef tongue five stars rated. Even the music vibin with the ambience. They also have special deal for oyster only 10k/pcs every wed. So happy to be here with friend and family.
review 2: The oysters are incredibly fresh and delicious, a true delight for seafood lovers. The complimentary wine is a thoughtful touch that adds to the overall charm of this restaurant. Highly recommend for anyone looking for a memorable meal in bali
review 3:
Boyana was the 1st restaurant we had the day we landed and it was the best restaurant during our stay in Bali . It‚Äôs so hard to match up the service and food we had there ‚Ä¶ it‚Äôs simply glorious !!
Arjuna and Glen had made our visit to the restaurant unforgettable .
We recommend the Pork Knuckle which is to die for ‚Ä¶ and the belacan (chilli past) is So.ooooo.. good .
They have a lounge too.. where you can dance to the latest hit..(only available on certain days.. check with the restaurant).
Overall I  rate it a 5 out of 5 stars !
Thank you so much for the great experience !
review 4:
Absolutely loved my experience at Boyana Bali! The service was amazing, their staff made us feel right at home. The food was fantastic, especially their beef taco, pork knuckle, and crispy pork salad, each dish bursting with flavor and cooked to perfection. Love their cocktail also, maruwai is my fave!

The ambiance was cozy and inviting, perfect for a relaxed dining experience. Definitely a must visit spot in canggu.
review 5: What a delightful find in canggu! Boyana exceeded all expectations with its incredible service and mouthwatering brunch spread. The bottomless brunch promo is an absolute steal, offering a fantastic variety of dishes that are as delicious as they are instagram-worthy. The staff here are incredibly friendly and helpful, we're so happyyy

name: WORD HUMMUS BAR vegetarian cafe
address: Jl. Pantai Batu Bolong No.45, Canggu, Kec. Kuta Utara, Kabupaten Badung, Bali 80361, Indonesia
types: vegetarian_restaurant, vegan_restaurant, brunch_restaurant, restaurant, store, food
review 1:
Everything was a 10/10. We had the falafel wrap, and it was one of my favorite meals I‚Äôve ever had. Best falafel wrap I‚Äôve ever had in my life. I could eat it every day.

Also, the staff said the green mayo was vegan.

We also had the bowl with kimchi and seaweed (can‚Äôt remember the name) with pesto sauce. It was soooo good too. I might try the soy sauce option next time.

The staff is very friendly, helpful, and caring. They put a lot of effort into making sure the dishes taste amazing.
review 2: I & family visited this place randomly. I didn't notice that it's a vegetarian cafe (which is i'm an omnivore and not into any vegetarian food) and surprisingly all the food we ordered are so delicious and yummy! My husband really so in love with the food and finished it. We just found another favorite cafe in Bali, and definitely will come here again / more often. ü´∂üèº
review 3:
Loved the menu, but the food was disappointing. For a place named after Hummus, the hummus was truly lacking. It tastes like purely mashed up chickpeas, but stale.

We ordered a few other dishes, and the falafel balls were tasty. The rest were average at best. My two friends said it was the worst pickle they‚Äôve ever had.

The plus point: portions were generous. Staff were nice.

As much as we wanted to like this place, we likely won‚Äôt come back.
review 4: Just out from the restaurant and I had to share the experience. Sooo lovely and feeling full and happy. Shared few dishes with my husband and brother and we all loved it! The place is quiet and with a lovely vibe, staff suuuper friendly and food delicious, what else can we ask for? Desserts were a big hit for us after the savory part of the evening. Totally recommend this place!
review 5: Highly recommended cafe, I had very delicious bowl, the food was fresh and the portion was big enough. I love the idea of choosing dressing, they bring it on the side, so you can add any amount that you prefer. I also had crepes with boiled condensed milk, it was super yummy. Also they have amazing selection of loose leaf and herbal teas! Truly enjoyed every single dish and beverage that I ordered.

name: The Lebak Canggu
address: Canggu, Kuta Utara, Badung Regency, Bali 80351, Indonesia
review 1:
The hotel was located beside the main road in Canggu, which was both an advantage and a disadvantage.
The advantage was that it was easy to access; the disadvantage was that the vehicles on the road were quite noisy.

The room was clean, but the bathroom sink, taps, and shower head need replacement since they're already very worn down. Lucky for us, the owner of this hotel noticed the complaint and replaced all of them with brand new ones immediately.

The bathtub was OK, but there is not enough hot water for it to be fully filled. The owner needs to replace the water heater with one with a bigger capacity.

There was neither a TV nor a refrigerator inside the room, so you needed to go to the communal area for it.
The communal area was quite dirty; it definitely needs regular cleaning.

There was direct laundry service within the premise, so it's quite helpful for people who want to clean their clothes.

The overall experience was good but could be better.

4/5 Star.
review 2:
We had a number of issues staying at this place and would not recommend it to anyone. We cut our stay short.

The biggest issue we had was that another guest had stolen our items from the communal kitchen. There were no repercussions for this guest apart from asking for payment. They should have had a strict policy and kicked this person out.
Also, even when I asked for the money to be returned to me, there were miscommunications and the full amount wasn‚Äôt there for me to receive.

Other things:

1. Very uncomfortable bed
2. Dirty shared kitchen
3. Sound traveled far (ai learned that wooden houses don‚Äôt have good sound insulation).
4. Shower was old and there was not enough hot water.
5. Location is far and without a scooter it‚Äôs dangerous to walk anywhere as you will be walking along a busy road.

The owner tried to resolve some of the issues we had, but of course we would have had a much better experience if they hadn‚Äôt happened at all. We found another place to stay and checked out at 11pm.

Note: in reply to the owners reply, the fridges were very dirty, I put my drink where it was still kind of clean. Other reviews have also mentioned how dirty the fridges were, it was not just me. The rest of the kitchen was fine and yes every room had their own cutlery and plates etc. I didn‚Äôt comment on that.

Nobody offered me 100K, plus I should not have to be the one offering change.

I could have addressed it with the customer if I had been around. But we left for three days an hour after I found out, leaving some luggage in the room. That is the only reason I didn‚Äôt check out straight away. Plus, I did not know who took it and it is the responsibility of the accommodation, is it not?

I never leave any bad reviews on Google unless it is really something worth mentioning. I don‚Äôt know where the owner got the notion that we wanted to stay longer and we were upset that we couldn‚Äôt. That is false. Through Agoda we shortened our stay until right after we came back from Java.
review 3:
Beautiful houses and nice pool. Great value for the price.
Unfortunately the bathrooms are old and dirty.
Unfortunately we got obligated to lost the room key and the housekeeping Lady wanted to charge us extra.
The owner was really nice though and he came over and solved the situation.
review 4: Incredible friendly service across the board. I will say they have many friendly cats on property, so it‚Äôs not a great choice if you have a cat allergy, but that‚Äôs the only negative that I can think of.
review 5: Amazing!!!  staff is amazing accommodating to your every need. Super clean and well maintained . Is a really good location very close to everything 5 mins ride to the beach . Very relaxing pool area and awesome kitchen area . Would highly recommend staying here .

name: Copenhagen Bakery
address: Jl. Raya Tiyingtutul No.6, Pererenan, Kec. Mengwi, Kabupaten Badung, Bali 80351, Indonesia
review 1:
Great place, serves straight up great delicious dough. I love the pumpkin seed bun, the croissant and the ham & cheese danish.

All of them are great! Their viennoiseries are not the type that's carried by the butter quality, they're the ones that actually has delicious bread dough (iykyk).

Highly recommend paying them a visit, they're also moving soon. So catch them at their new location.
review 2: Absolutely love Copenhagen Bali! The ambience is cozy and inviting, and they serve the most delightful carrot cake. It's a must-try for anyone with a sweet tooth. The friendly staff and great service make it a perfect spot to unwind. They offer motorbike parking, which is convenient, and their a la carte menu has a nice variety. Highly recommend!
review 3:
Excellent baked goods, excellent sandwiches, and excellent coffee. Their Pressed Pesto Sandwich with Chicken Slaw on Sourdough was amazing, and their Carrot Cake was delicious.

Prices are on the high end (wish they weren't so steep), and also had difficulty understanding their menu which used a lot of slashes (/) but not to indicate options. Could be a minimalist Scandi design thing, but it just had me confused.

Other than that, everything else was great. Some parking for motorcycles, limited street parking, and mostly semi-outdoor and outdoor seating.
review 4: One of my favorite coffee places! Relaxing atmosphere. Homemade almond milk üëåüèª
review 5:
Great bakes and coffee. Also had a nice matcha latte and orange juice. Service is great and staff are friendly.

Only downside is that the place is located right by the road, so it‚Äôs a little noisy and dusty. Still highly recommend, though!

name: The Chillhouse Canggu by BVR Bali Holiday Rentals
address: Banjar Pipitan, Jl. Kubu Manyar No.22, Canggu, Kec. Kuta Utara, Kabupaten Badung, Bali 80361, Indonesia
review 1:
Really happy with my stay here.
I am disheartened to read the other reviews as I think the cost is worth the money. NZD $69.
It is incredibly peaceful to come back to after being out all day in the hussle and bussle of the streets.
Few mosquitoes around but pack some bug spray. Great air conditioner in the rooms, the pool is always quite so mostly had to myself.
The room is everything you need.

Staff are just lovely and make a fantastic coffee (:
It‚Äôs honestly just so peaceful waking up here.
Thank you for my stay üëè
review 2: The staff is very nice and helpful, room had good atmosphere, not tv but got mini bar, Wi-Fi fast and reliable. But the dogs outside at night is very aggressive and frightening, they follow and barking at us all the time, they only stop following when we enter the cafe. It's bad experience for those who rarely interact with dog.
review 3: It is the second time I stayed in Chillhouse and whilst I love the overall atmosphere I do feel the place could do with significant renovation and cleaning. Although they raised the prices they did not take care of the overall feel of the place, and unfortunately I really felt the difference compared to last year. The place is worn out and needs improvement on this end to match the new prices they set
review 4:
Not a surf or yoga retreat anymore. Changed ownership 2 years ago and basically a budget hotel now.

Staff are nice, but the place is run incredibly lean (cafe staff do a lot).

Nothing wrong with the place, I just expected a retreat based on a friends recommendation. For the price and comparable quality I could have got something better. Booked four days and left after 1.
review 5: I really enjoyed my stay at Chill House. The staff is incredibly friendly. The included breakfast is fantastic. The coffee shop and dining area make for a great place to get some work done. The rooms are quite nice and secluded. I also really enjoyed lounging by the pool or the front porch of my room. Great place to stay. I highly recommend!

name: Paripadi Studio Canggu
address: Jl. Kubu Manyar 21, Br. Pipitan, Jl. Pantai Batu Bolong, Canggu, Kec. Kuta Utara, Kabupaten Badung, Bali 80363, Indonesia
review 1:
The best accommodation in Canggu for me
so far. The spotless rooms and excellent service aside, they even surprised me by decorating my room for my birthday without any request from me, showing the enthusiasm of the friendly staff here. Additionally, it is well-located, with just a 20-30 minute walk to the beach, allowing me to fully enjoy the beauty of Canggu. I highly recommend this stay to anyone looking for accommodation in Canggu. I will definitely be back again. ‚ù§Ô∏èüëçüèª
review 2: My first trip to Bali started out rough until I made it to this sanctuary of a hotel. The service is amazing. The bed is so comfortable, it takes you hostage. The view from any point in the hotel is breathtaking. This will be my go-to place whenever I come back. EXCEPTIONAL!
review 3:
Amazing experience ! Staff is so nice and the room was really clean. We had an amazing view.
I forgot something in the room and they texted me and kept it for 2 weeks before I came back to Canggu üòç
I will definitely come back üôè
review 4:
Lovely new place to stay a little tucked away from the hustle & bustle but still ideally located. The rooms are nice, tidy, the beds are SO SO comfy. I came back 3 times this time.
WiFi is relatively good for work.
When we arrived they had a BBQ in the garden - loved everything of it. Besides this, the team is a bunch of lovely, professional but so caring and loving people that I really felt like coming home every time - and sad leaving. Will return for sure and recommend it to all my friends ‚òÄÔ∏è
review 5:
Absolutely!

---

Nestled amidst lush greenery and surrounded by breathtaking views, Parapadi Resort offers an unparalleled retreat for any traveler seeking tranquility and luxury. From the moment I arrived, I was greeted with warm smiles and impeccable hospitality, setting the tone for a truly unforgettable stay.

The resort boasts a harmonious blend of modern amenities and rustic charm, seamlessly integrating with its natural surroundings. The spacious and elegantly appointed rooms provided a haven of comfort, complete with comfortable furnishings and panoramic vistas of the serene landscape.

For those seeking relaxation, the resort's spa offered a haven of rejuvenation, with a range of indulgent treatments designed to melt away stress and restore balance to the mind, body, and soul.

Overall, my experience at Parapadi Resort surpassed all expectations. I cannot wait to return to this hidden gem and immerse myself in its tranquil beauty once again.

name: Mag Canggu By Hospitality Bali
address: Br Pipitan, Jl. Kubu Manyar No.33, Canggu, Kec. Kuta Utara, Kabupaten Badung, Bali 80361, Indonesia
review 1:
Dont usually leave reviews and my last hotel had a weird smell in my toilet that I didn't mind, but I felt like I needed to leave a review for this one.

Got the deluxe bungalow.

Room 1
Service 4
Location 4

The room is full of ants and bugs, there is netting which helps a little bit but the ants are everywhere, probably due to the room being a traditional room, so there are gaps in the wood where bugs and ants can get in.

The toilet is nice and clean-ish. again there are lots of ants everywhere.

Air conditioning is weak, and gets super hot during the day (you can feel the walls of the room are hot as well since the sun is shining right on it).

Walked past the other rooms, one door was open and I could feel the super cold air from the room so I knew it was just the deluxe bungalow that had weak air conditioning.

Asked to staff if we could look at other rooms to downgrade to, and at first staff said it was possible but I think after messaging the manager they didn't allow it and said that all rooms were booked (I don't know how legitimate this is because my girlfriend told me she saw the whiteboard they have and there were rooms available)

However, they do have laundry service and the receptionist was patient with me taking too long to get the clothes that I needed to wash.

Location wise i will say this is a quiet area in canggu so its relatively nice and peaceful?

Overall a general disappointment, will probably leave this room tomorrow as I can't stand so many insects where I sleep and judging from reviews some of the other rooms are not great either.
review 2: Lovely place to stay. Shared kitchen is not very clean tho but room and pool are nice
review 3: The room was designed very minimally, had ants crawling around and there‚Äôs strong sewage smell from the toilet. Benefit is that there‚Äôs a balcony overlooking the pool for the units at level 2. For units at level 1, it‚Äôs quite exposed to everyone. This is located a distance away from the main restaurants, exercise studios and beach club which give it some privacy.
review 4: Pictures and old reviews were misleading as it seemed like this was a nice clean place but in reality it wasn‚Äôt. The bathroom was really dirty and smelly and the room had a strange odour that we had to buy air fresheners cos we could hardly sleep through the stench one night. The bedsheets also had a funny smell and were dirty and rough. It wasn‚Äôt all terrible because the staff were nice and chill, but i honestly think the management has been neglecting this place of late
review 5:
Stayed in the bungalow and absolutely hated it. The aircon was too weak, making the room too hot. There were ants and mosquitoes EVERYWHERE. There are stains on the pillows and bedcovers, and the staff were extremely unaccommodating in our request to change rooms. Also, front desk is unmanned after office hours.

EDIT:
After posting this review, manager reached out through Agoda to try to accommodate to the change request but at this point I have already booked another room elsewhere. Wanted a refund but booking policy says no refunds allowed, despite me reaching out on both Agoda and Whatsapp to try to ask for a change of room just 2 hours into the booking. I also would like to note that I have already asked the staff beforehand to change the room and they said it cannot be done despite me seeing on their board that there were empty rooms. I am severely disappointed in their service recovery.

name: Urban Jungle House
address: Jl. Pantai Batu Bolong No.49, Canggu, Kec. Kuta Utara, Kabupaten Badung, Bali 80351, Indonesia
review 1: We stayed here for 4 nights, and the service is amazing. Dani who was running the place is simply the kindest guy and the rooms are nice with aircondition and own bathrooms. There is also a great pool, pooltable and a kitchen with basic supplies. Great experience!
review 2: We had an amazing time, Dani received us with a big smile and really good vibes, the room was clean, the hostel as good environment and the staff is the best
review 3:
Stayed here couple times whenever I came to Bali (to Canggu). The location was just perfect, walking distance to almost everything you need.

The room was clean, tidy and comfy.

Buana, Mo, Krabby. They were the staff there and made it feels like home. They were so helpful for the advice to do around Bali, even for the food!

Definitely would go back here again when I'll be back in Bali.

Keep the good work, champs!
review 4:
The dorm has big and thick beds, super comfortable! Bathroom is clean and the staff is so friendly. Shout out to Buana, Mo, and Krabby.
It was a nice stay to meet with the other guests too! Travelled alone and become friends with so many good people there.
The location is good, there are minimarkets, pharmacy, and some cafe just outside the hostel.
Would come back again next time!
review 5: Great value for money, very good location and great host (thanks again Dani you‚Äôre a legend !)

name: ROMAN PIZZA & PASTA CANGGU
address: Jl. Canggu Padang Linjong No.3, Canggu, Kec. Kuta Utara, Kabupaten Badung, Bali 80351, Indonesia
review 1:
My Girlfriend and I already went several times to Roman. We just love it.

the food is excellent and we have never been disappointed, we would come back at any time.

We would especially like to highlight the staff, great team and super friendly!

If you want delicious Italian food from a real Italian restaurant, this is definitely the place for you.

Thanks Luca and Team ‚úåüèº
review 2:
First things first, the pizza is good enough that no one will be offended, but that's the best I can say about it. It won't win any awards and won't make a single person's "Best Pizza in Bali" list.

Similarly, we had the Bolognaise pasta and the spaghetti was chewy which was weird because it wasn't al dente or even hard, as I would expect it to be of undercooked. It was just... chewy. The sauce was similar to the pizza... good enough not to offend anyone but hardly can be considered "good"

On top of the food, it must be mentioned that there is no dining room to speak off. Just a few tables open to the road, which wouldn't normally be noteworthy except that it was right by the road which made eating there hot, dusty and noisy.

Finally, we need to talk about the prices, which are very good for what you get. It's this element of value which nudges the restaurant from a 3 to 4 stars.
review 3: Ordered 2 pizza. Got them fairly quick. Ate them. Beyond satisfaction. Thin dough, delicious toppings, crispy crust, cheesy. Just good. (chili oil also has a good punch)
review 4:
THE BEST PIZZA!
Amazing staff, friendly and helpful, several times we ordered pizza delivery from this shop through the Grab food app for our pool time or dinner, we have to say the pizza tasted damn good and it was a relaxed and very nice atmosphere when we decided to visit their store in Canggu, Plenty of attention put into the dough and sauce recipes.
Excellent place, with excellent food, no doubt! you guys should try it, even better visit the store because Grandma's Tiramisu is simply so good. Will be back and order some more for sure.
review 5: A very small pizzeria with limited space outside to sit, mainly focused on delivery. But despite the limited space, it is nice to sit there to eat and do some work. The menu is limited to a few pizzas, pastas and desserts, but the pizza I ate there was of excellent quality and very fine taste, definitely recommended to eat or order from!

name: Long Play
address: Jl. Raya Tiyingtutul No.13, Pererenan, Kec. Mengwi, Kabupaten Badung, Bali 80351, Indonesia
review 1:
Amazing food and definitely the best coffee in Pererenan ‚Äì we have breakfast here several times a week and never tired of it

New lunch menu is also great! Chicken with mashed potatoes was super delicious as well as gazpacho.

Cozy atmosphere and fast wifi for those who enjoy working at cafes üëåüèø
review 2: One of my favourite place for breakfast. The food is delicious and always fresh, coffee is good and staff are friendlyüå∫
review 3: Exceptional atmosphere, friendly staff and amazing food! Coffee there is to die for! Good music as wellüëåüèº
review 4: Such a sweet spot, super mellow and good atmosphere always. I go every single morning for the warm flakey croissant with butter and jam, Truffle Ricotta omelette with a side of chicken sausage. It‚Äôs amazing for hitting my protein goals early in the morning! But this place has the best tasting matcha and really good oatmilk.  I can‚Äôt start my day without it!
review 5: Amazing food & coffee, really friendly staff and beautiful atmosphere. The snickers bowl is to die for and the coffee really high quality!

name: Loco By Nature
address: Jl. Canggu Padang Linjong No.7X, Canggu, Kec. Kuta Utara, Kabupaten Badung, Bali 80361, Indonesia
review 1: The place was cool, there was great music, and they had a skateboarding bowl, which you can skate in; the owner and workers were friendly, but the pizza was just ok. Overall 9/10, I would recommend going!!!
review 2: every time I come this place is closed. It's not written about this anywhere.
review 3: Really fun bar with an awesome bowl to skate.
review 4:
Awful place with no consideration for their neighbors. Blasting annoying & obnoxiously loud music until almost midnight on Sunday's and other weeknight. Do not support businesses like these.
Fingers crossed they'll get shut down soon enough, too bad they weren't ones to go bust during 2021 ü§û
review 5: Nice sunset ambience, good place to hangout with friends. The food was okay, the price is affordable

name: Nami Surf Stay Batu Bolong
address: 946V+3V7, Jl. Pantai Batu Bolong, Canggu, Kec. Kuta Utara, Kabupaten Badung, Bali, Indonesia
review 1:
The Orange cat is the best thing about this place. Please take care of him. Show him love, give him wet food, and allow him to sleep inside if you want to(he loves it).

The place has a lot of unexploited potential.
The place itself is not as well maintained as I anticipated. Cracking bed, very old doors, no decoration whatsoever making the rooms quite unwelcoming, old cabinets painted instead of replaced. The bad part for was the extremely pungent smell in the washroom coming from all of the algae growing on the shower floor, as well as the bathroom seat which was dark and moldy and smelly. I‚Äôve come to realize that most toilets in bali stink because the toilet seat lid is never cleaned, and accumulated pee on toilet seat lids isn‚Äôt a great idea for the most hygienic smell. You can literally smell it from anywhere in the bathroom.

The outdoor space is good, and the kitchen area is also okay. Maybe it was a stroke of bad luck but 90% of the people staying there(mostly russians) were extremely unfriendly and acted as though we were in their personal space and that we were bothering them.

To each their own I guess.
review 2: Really nice place! Very chilled out space, the staff are also very friendly and attentive - rooms cleaned daily - would recommend staying here.
review 3:
Awesome accommodation!
The rooms are clean and very nice, bead and pillows comfortable, interesting bathroom with open part in the ceiling, the pool is perfect for day swimming and evening chill. There is also a shared kitchen as an option for cooking. Host was also super nice. It is very quiet in the evening.
review 4: Absolutely loved the stay! We stayed here for five nights and everything scored 10/10. Very clean rooms, good bed, nice swimming pool and pleasant communal areas to relax or work. Staff is the sweetest! Location is perfect (with a scooter) which you can also rent at the accommodation. We will definitely come back to the accommodation.
review 5: I was skeptical with so few reviews, but I really liked it here. The rooms are a nice size, the bed and pillows are pretty comfortable, the pool is clean and nicely situated in the sun, the hotel itself is located off of a side street so it‚Äòs quiet at night. The place even has a free water refill and a usable shared kitchen. The staff were really friendly and helpful. The hotel is located reasonably close to some grocery stores and restaurants. I would come back to stay here again!

name: Warung Nasi Babi Guling Men Agus
address: Jl. Raya Canggu No.163, Canggu, Kec. Kuta Utara, Kabupaten Badung, Bali 80351, Indonesia
review 1: In my opinion, this is one of the best bigul in the Canggu - Tanah Lot area. It is more popular with locals than tourists, and the price is very reasonable, around 35-40K per person. The bigul is similar to Pak Malen's, but with fewer condiments, crispier pork skin, and a spicier sambal. The soup is served with ares. The restaurant is quite spacious and can accommodate more than 50 people. In my opinion, it was better a few years ago than it is now, in terms of portion size and price, but it is still one of the best in the area and tastier than Men L***.
review 2:
Came here for lunch on my mission to eat all babi guling here„ÄÇmenu was easy with either campur or pisah option which is together with rice or separate, portions don't seem to differ that much?

Order came, I think highlight is the soup very tasteful and the pork skin is good but rest is tad boring the other meat supposingly be crispy aren't and the main meat too dry. Will give this a pass again.

Also not the cheapest for what it is.
review 3: Only 2 selections (mixed and separated) of the same dish which is still okay since that was what I came for. Their soup was super nice however the main dishes are just normal, better if they serve the main dishes hot
review 4:
A babi guling joint frequented largely by locals. Tried it as was on the way to Uluwatu.

Restaurant set up was simple. Non air conditioned and back faces the padi field. Tables were sparesely laid out and felt quitr comfortable given the well ventilation by fans and natural breeze.

The babi guling rice was different from Ibu Oka. Pork is similar in texture but the sauce was different. I prefer Ibu Oka against this. Made a side order of pork skin and it was hard as with Ibu Oka's version. Much prefer the goreng version which is crispy. Price wise is about 45% lower vs Ibu Oka (Rp30k vs Rp55k).
review 5:
It's decent babi guling at a good pics, 2 campur, 1 beer, coconut glass and juice.

It's not the best I've had, but it's pretty good still! And they're open till 830pm. Service is also fast and staff are fairly friendly.

Soup could be richer and more savoury.

name: TYM SEA FOOD CANGGU - Supplier and Restaurant
address: Canggu, Kuta Utara, Badung Regency, Bali 80351, Indonesia
review 1:
EXCELLENT. We made the hike from seminyak and it was well worth it. We came for the prawns and smashed about 1.5kg with a side of squid, cucumbers and tomatoes. Everything was delicious. Both garlic & bbq sauce were perfectly basted onto the seafood and the flavours were as good as the grilling. Really can't recommend this place enough, a fraction of what you'd pay at Jimbaran but even better quality. Mosquito repellent needing to be worn as it is in front of a swamp. Very humble surrounding and I'm very happy supporting a local warung.

The service was spot on with really lovely staff, thank you to Rundun for being so polite and waiting on us tonight. Looking forward to returning next week!

Also you're able to whatsapp order & transfer pay ahead of time to secure some seafood which was a pretty cool. Kind prawns usually run out around 2pm so if you're really keen on them order ahead. Otherwise, the other prawns were perfectly delicious which is what we had - oh - and very easy to eat. Almost no peeling etc required, the flesh came straight off.

NOTE: PLEASE IF YOU SEE THE CAT FEED IT YOUR PRAWN HEADS. Good for it and better than going in the bin üòä
review 2:
A must visit seafood place in Canggu!

I absolutely love grilled yellow tail fish (not sure what it called) and prawn. Their prawn was so tender and sweet. Love love love it!

The vibe was okay, they could put more fans and maybe some mosquito repellent device

Price was okay, worth it.
review 3: Nevermind the ghetto spot and 0 decor. Food is fresh and cooked perfectly. Absolutely good value and the real old-school Bali feel. No frills. They supply alot of restaurants who mark it up, same thing anyway
review 4: This hidden gem of a seafood restaurant offers an amazing experience for seafood lovers. It‚Äôs a very simple place, not very noticeable from the outside, but once you get in and have a bite , you won‚Äôt regret. The restaurant serves up fresh fish and seafood cooked any way you like, freshly just for you, ensuring a burst of natural flavors in every bite. For a delicious and unforgettable meal bursting with freshness and flavor, this restaurant in Bali is a must-visit destination for those seeking a true taste of the sea.
review 5: Great food, absolutely delicious, affordable, can‚Äôt go wrong with these kind of local restaurants, only downside was the place is full of mosquitoes, but they did provide mosquitoes spray on each table, will come back next time.
